 Promotion for top up before 11th - 12th March, 2014 1. Content and regulations: - Pre-paid subscribers (active, one-way blocked, two-way blocked - still in the maintaining period) receive the following benefits when top-up: MobiQ, Q-Teen, Q-kid subscribers : bonus 50% value (25% added to KM2 credit, 25% added to KM3 credit) Others (excluding PFC subscribers): bonus 35% value (15% added to KM 2 credit, 20% added to KM3 credit) MobiCard subscriber : Bonus 100% days of use from the top-up if the main balance have more than VND0 after loading. - NOT applied for: PFC subscribers. Top up value MobiQ, Q-Teen, Q-kid Others (except for PFC) MobiCard KM2 KM3 KM2 KM3 Days of use 5.000 1.250 1.250 750 1.000 02 10.000 2.500 2.500 1.500 2.000 04 20.000 5.000 5.000 3.000 4.000 08 30.000 7.500 7.500 4.500 6.000 14 50.000 12.500 12.500 7.500 10.000 24 100.000 25.000 25.000 15.000 20.000 60 200.000 50.000 50.000 30.000 40.000 14 0 300.000 75.000 75.000 45.000 60.000 230 500.000 125.000 125.000 75.000 100.000 430 - Notice : Unlimited times and value of top-up Subscribers that are under the promotion for new subscribers: First top up: receive benefits from the new subscribers promotion. From the second top up: receive benefits from this promotion and be considered as one top-up of the previously mentioned promotion. 2.
